name: GENESIS (demo)
description:
Wander through the desolate hallways of Protogonos Laboratories; a once thriving facility fuelled on scientific innovation and limitless boundaries.  Uncover secrets that have been hidden beneath the privacy of these murky depths. Find solace in an old soldier from a forgotten war and a synthetic being with an artificial heart. Most importantly... uncover the truth behind your own existence.

Features:

  • Original Soundtrack by Calum Stuart
  • All-Original Art and Tile sets by spectre

Technical Specs:

  • Engine: Wolf Editor RPG
  • Sound effects: Wolf Editor RPG & Zapsplat Sounds
  • Run time: 30 - 50 minutes
